description: This table extracts the dental procedure historical surfaces.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the finding record

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the historical instant in the dental procedure record. Together with FINDING_ID, this forms the foreign key to the DENTAL_PROC_HX table.
